impact-statement: The protozoan parasite <italic>Trypanosoma brucei gambiense</italic> has undergone recent clonal evolution that reveals the theoretically predicted Meselson effect at a genome-wide level.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
